paragraph.heading: 1Introduction
paragraph.paragraph:
With ISE EiffelStudio you can encapsulate features written in
10_c_externals.xml C ,
20_cpp_externals.xml C++ and
30_java_externals.xml Java . This makes it possible to use powerful libraries written in other languages while still benefiting from the use of Eiffel for the frame of the program.
